perturbation.original_text: 5.1. The rights granted Developer in this Agreement are subject to any prior territorial rights of other franchisees which may now exist in the Territory, whether or not those rights are currently being enforced. In the event of a conflict in territorial rights, whether under a Franchise Agreement or separate territorial or development agreement, Developer shall be free to negotiate with any person, corporation or other entity, which claims territorial rights adverse to the rights granted under this Agreement, for the assignment of those prior territorial rights. For this purpose, Franchisor agrees to approve any such assignment not in conflict with the other terms of this Agreement, subject to the condition of any Franchise Agreements involved, and current policies pertaining to assignments, including, but not limited to, satisfaction of all past due debts owed to Franchisor and the execution of a General Release.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.1. The rights granted Developer in this Agreement are subject to any prior territorial rights of other franchisees which may now exist in the Territory, whether or not those rights are currently being enforced. In the event of a conflict in territorial rights, whether under a Franchise Agreement or separate territorial or development agreement, Developer may not be free to negotiate without the franchisor's consent. For this purpose, Franchisor may decline assignment approval if there are conflicts with the terms of this agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original text implies that the developer is free to negotiate, whereas the modified text makes it uncertain whether a developer can negotiate without franchisor approval, especially with added conflicts.

perturbation.original_text:
11.1. The following events shall constitute a default by Developer, which shall result in El Pollo Loco's right to declare the immediate termination of this Agreement.
a. Failure by Developer to meet the requirements of the Development Schedule within the time periods specified therein, including failure by Developer to meet the Site Commitment Date or Opening Date for each site for an El Pollo Loco® Restaurant in a timely manner as set forth in Exhibit “B” and Section 2 above.
perturbation.changed_text:
11.1. The following events may constitute a default by Developer, which may result in El Pollo Loco's right to declare the termination of this Agreement.
a. Failure by Developer to generally attempt to meet the requirements of the Development Schedule, including attempts to meet the Site Commitment Date or Opening Date for each site for an El Pollo Loco® Restaurant as set forth in Exhibit “B” and Section 2 above.
perturbation.explanation: The original text is specific about failing to meet deadlines being a default. The modified text introduces ambiguity, making it unclear whether a missed deadline automatically triggers termination.

perturbation.original_text: 15.1. This Agreement, including Exhibits "A", "B" and “C” attached hereto, constitutes the entire full and complete agreement between Franchisor and Developer concerning the subject matter hereof and supersedes any and all prior written agreements. No other representations have induced Developer to execute this Agreement, and there are no representations, inducements, promises, or agreements, oral or otherwise, between the parties, not embodied herein, which are of any force or effect with reference to this Agreement or otherwise. Notwithstanding the foregoing, nothing in this Agreement shall disclaim or require Developer to waive reliance on any representation that Franchisor made in the most recent disclosure document (including its exhibits and amendments) that Franchisor delivered to Developer or its representative, subject to any agreed-upon changes to the contract terms and conditions described in that disclosure document and reflected in this Agreement (including any riders or addenda signed at the same time as this Agreement). The provisions of this Agreement may not be contradicted by any other statement concerning the subject matter herein. No amendment or modification of this Agreement shall be binding on either party unless written and fully executed.
perturbation.changed_text: 15.1. This Agreement, including Exhibits "A", "B" and “C” attached hereto, constitutes the general understanding between Franchisor and Developer and supersedes any and all prior written agreements. Other representations may have induced Developer to execute this Agreement, and there may be representations, inducements, promises, or agreements, oral or otherwise, between the parties, not embodied herein, which are of some force or effect with reference to this Agreement or otherwise. The provisions of this Agreement may be contradicted by any other statement concerning the subject matter herein. Amendments or modifications of this Agreement may be binding if both parties acknowledge the alteration.
perturbation.explanation: The original text declares the contract as the *entire* agreement; the modified text implies there *may* be other agreements. It is also uncertain whether both parties need to acknowledge the altercation or if there is a standard for modification.
